title: Image Filter Application
problem_statement:
Image Filter Application

Problem Description

You are building a simple image filter application that applies CSS filters to an image. The project structure is in place, but you need to complete three simple one-liner tasks.

Objectives:

  • Add the ID "previewImage" to the img element
  • Set the box-shadow of the active filter button to 0 0 0 2px #6200ee
  • Apply the selected filter to the image by updating its style.filter property

Constraints

  • Do not change the existing HTML structure or class names
  • Ensure your solution applies all filter types correctly
